theme.name: Breeze
theme.color-scheme:
body-bg=#FFFFFF
layout-bg=#95B2FF layout-text=#000000
layout-tab-bg=#E0E0E0 layout-tab-text=#000000
layout-tab-selected-bg=#A0A0A0 layout-tab-selected-text=#404040
portlet-title-bg=#e0e0e0 portlet-title-text=#333333
portlet-menu-bg=#f0f0f0 portlet-menu-text=#000000
portlet-bg=#FFFFFF
portlet-font=#333333 portlet-font-dim=#404040
portlet-msg-status=#000000 portlet-msg-info=#FFFFFF portlet-msg-error=#ff0000 portlet-msg-alert=#ff0000 portlet-msg-success=#007f00
portlet-section-header=#596171 portlet-section-header-bg=#afbeda
portlet-section-subheader=#405278 portlet-section-subheader-bg=#91aee8
portlet-section-body=#404040 portlet-section-body-bg=#E0E0E0
portlet-section-body-hover=#ffffff portlet-section-body-hover-bg=#f0f0f0
portlet-section-alternate=#3f3f3f portlet-section-alternate-bg=#dbe1ed
portlet-section-alternate-hover=#ffffff portlet-section-alternate-hover-bg=#5274ae
portlet-section-selected=#404040 portlet-section-selected-bg=#A0A0A0
portlet-section-selected-hover=#00329a portlet-section-selected-hover-bg=#c0d2f7
